thread.title: Meridian Community College coach accused of assault
thread.title_full: Meridian Community College coach accused of assault - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Meridian Community College coach accused of assault
text:
MERIDIAN, Miss. (AP) - A community college coach is facing an assault charge.
WTOK-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1W89yZr ) a student and soccer player at Meridian Community College has accused coach Alex George in an affidavit alleging simple assault by threat and two counts of physical simple assault.
Lauderdale County Chief Deputy Ward Calhoun says the student claims George verbally threatened him, punched him the head and grabbed him by his throat and cursed at him. A warrant was issued Oct 16.
Calhoun says George surrendered to authorities, was booked and has since bonded out of jail.
This isn't the first time George has faced an assault charge. In 2010, he was accused of assault for an altercation at the State Games. The disposition of that case was not immediately known.
Information from: WTOK-TV, http://www.wtok.com
